mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRIL_REPLY ORDER BY REPLY_SEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM TRIL_REPLY where u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY REPLY_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIL_REPLY (reply_seq, u_id, pd_seq , reply_title, reply_date, reply_content, reply_rate) values(reply_seq.nextVal,#{u_id},#{pd_seq},#{reply_title},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mm'),#{reply_content},#{reply_rate})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_seq, u_id, pd_seq , reply_title, reply_date, reply_content, reply_rate FROM ( SELECT reply_seq, u_id, pd_seq , reply_title, reply_date, reply_content, reply_rate, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY reply_seq ASC) AS rn FROM TRIL_REPLY ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY reply_seq ASC
select count(reply_seq) from TRIL_REPLY where reply_seq>0
